/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and the bright blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and motorcycles weaving their way through the traffic. Trees line the sides of the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
